checkout-hdx-delivery-slots-uk.stair-pre: Are there any stairs to access this property?
checkout-hdx-delivery-slots-uk.toggle-sh: Due to high demand, part of your order has delayed shipping. Select a delivery option to proceed with this order and select a delivery date for the available products. If you would prefer all of your order to be delivered together, simply select the option to ship all products together and continue. Our customer support team will then contact you to arrange delivery once all products are available
checkout-hdx-delivery-slots-uk.ship-prod: Due to high demand, your order or part of it has delayed shipping. Please continue and we will contact you to arrange delivery once all of your products are available
checkout-hdx-delivery-slots-uk.gas-insta: Our customer support team will contact you to arrange a convenient date for delivery and installation, which will be completed by one of our gas safe registered engineers. Please proceed to payment to complete your purchase
checkout-hdx-delivery-slots-uk.bundle: Our customer support team will contact you to arrange a convenient date for delivery. Please proceed to payment to complete your purchase
checkout-hdx-delivery-slots-uk.special: Our team will be in contact using the details supplied to arrange delivery
checkout-hdx-delivery-slots-uk.leadtime: Due to high demand, your order or part of it has delayed shipping. Please continue and we will contact you to arrange delivery once your product is available
checkout-hdx-delivery-slots-uk.hurry: Hurry, this shipping time slot expires in 30 minutes.
checkout-hdx-delivery-slots-uk.installat: is not covered by our Installation service. The installation fee will be removed.
